prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a sleek, muscular body and a fierce expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines physical strength with agility, showcasing powerful limbs.
Design a fighting-type creature that thrives in mountainous terrains and has a striking color scheme.

Make a Pokemon that has a unique blend of colors and a distinct fighting stance.

distinctive_features: Large, yellow scales on the head
